overview: Senior Software Engineer - at Excite Rob managed the web site from early on through its successful IPO. As project manager and architect, at John Muir Health and Cascade Healthcare he designed the future state of technologies within the business and clinical environments. Rob also delivered web business models for startups like Branders.com, Geocast, The Money Suite, and OnTool. At Cisco, he architected process changes for service entitlement which reduced revenue leakage by millions of dollars. For PwC, Rob built a localized web based international tax liability application which had an adoption rate of 90% by 20,000 Sony expatriates.
